content.en: Enhanced inverter performance: Researchers have been investigating how to improve the performance of Z-Source inverters, which are used in power electronics. They have developed modified control algorithms that provide better voltage control, reduced line harmonics, improved AC output control, and reduced harmonic profile. These algorithms also achieve high voltage gain, increased output voltage, improved reliability, and low total harmonic distortion. The proposed algorithms employ space vector control and AI techniques, and they aim to improve efficiency, reduce inrush current, enhance power delivery, and simplify calculations.
content.da: Forbedret inverter ydeevne: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man kan forbedre ydeevnen af Z-Source invertere, som bruges i effektelektronik. De har udviklet modificerede kontrolalgoritmer, der giver bedre spændingskontrol, reducerede linjeharmoniske, forbedret AC output kontrol og reduceret harmonisk profil. Disse algoritmer opnår også høj spændingsforstærkning, øget udgangsspænding, forbedret pålidelighed og lav total harmonisk forvrængning. De foreslåede algoritmer anvender space vector control og AI-teknikker, og de sigter mod at forbedre effektiviteten, reducere startstrøm, forbedre effektlevering og forenkle beregninger.
